title: Purchasing Staff (10-15M)
company_name: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN GIẶT ỦI XANH
job_description:
• Research, evaluate, and select potential suppliers, ensuring product quality and competitive pricing.
• Negotiate contracts with suppliers to optimize costs and purchasing terms.
• Manage the entire procurement process, including placing orders, tracking, and ensuring timely delivery.
• Monitor and manage inventory levels, coordinating with related departments to maintain a stable supply for production.
• Analyze the market, evaluate price trends and supply chain conditions to make strategic purchasing decisions.
• Maintain and develop long-term relationships with suppliers to ensure effective collaboration.
• Prepare regular reports on purchasing activities, forecast demand, and monitor market trends.
• Other tasks as assigned by Manager.
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Economics, or related fields.
• At least 2-3 years of experience in purchasing.
• Excellent negotiation and communication skills, with the ability to handle challenging situations.
• Strong time management and organizational skills.
• Proficient in office software (Excel, Word)
• Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.
• Preference for males, under 28 years old
